REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0940 reute b f BC-NIGERIA-MAY-SIGN-DEBT 06-19 0103

TEXT.TITLE: NIGERIA MAY SIGN DEBT RESCHEDULING IN SEPTEMBER
TEXT.BODY: A target date of mid-September has been set for the signing of a package rescheduling Nigeria's medium term public sector debt and outstanding letter of credit claims, Nigeria and Barclays Bank Plc said in a joint statement. The statement was issued during the last of a two day meeting here between the two sides. Barclays is a co-chairman of the commercial bank steering committee. The statement said, "Further progress has been made in the 1986/87 rescheduling of medium term public sector debt and outstanding letter of credit claims." REUTER
